mapper.sql: id, cus_name, begin_date, update_date, seen_policymaker, policymaker_position, done_policymaker, done_policymaker_position, is_real, is_real_comment, five_user_up, five_user_up_comment, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, cus_emp_num, cus_city, launch_time, close_time, next_policymaker_action, next_req_action, true_close_time, status, uploads, assign, important_req, log_info, priority_level
mapper.insert: insert into sale_main_data (id, cus_name, begin_date, update_date, seen_policymaker, policymaker_position, done_policymaker, done_policymaker_position, is_real, is_real_comment, five_user_up, five_user_up_comment, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, cus_emp_num, cus_city, launch_time, close_time, next_policymaker_action, next_req_action, true_close_time, status, uploads, assign, important_req, log_info, priority_level) values (#{id}, #{cusName}, #{beginDate}, #{updateDate}, #{seenPolicymaker}, #{policymakerPosition}, #{donePolicymaker}, #{donePolicymakerPosition}, #{isReal}, #{isRealComment}, #{fiveUserUp}, #{fiveUserUpComment}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{cusEmpNum}, #{cusCity}, #{launchTime}, #{closeTime}, #{nextPolicymakerAction}, #{nextReqAction}, #{trueCloseTime}, #{status}, #{uploads}, #{assign}, #{importantReq}, #{logInfo}, #{priorityLevel})
mapper.select:
select
from sale_main_data order by begin_date desc

select m.id,m.cus_name,m.begin_date,m.update_date,m.seen_policymaker, m.policymaker_position,m.done_policymaker,m.done_policymaker_position, m.is_real,m.is_real_comment,m.five_user_up,m.five_user_up_comment, m.contact_name,m.contact_phone,m.contact_email,m.important_req, m.cus_emp_num,m.cus_city,m.launch_time,m.close_time,m.next_policymaker_action, m.next_req_action,m.true_close_time,m.status,m.log_info,m.priority_level, u.name as uploads , u2.name as assign from sale_main_data m left join sale_login_user u on m.uploads = u.id left join sale_login_user u2 on m.assign = u2.id order by m.priority_level asc , m.begin_date desc

select m.id,m.cus_name,m.begin_date,m.update_date,m.seen_policymaker, m.policymaker_position,m.done_policymaker,m.done_policymaker_position, m.is_real,m.is_real_comment,m.five_user_up,m.five_user_up_comment, m.contact_name,m.contact_phone,m.contact_email,m.important_req, m.cus_emp_num,m.cus_city,m.launch_time,m.close_time,m.next_policymaker_action, m.next_req_action,m.true_close_time,m.status,m.log_info,m.priority_level, u.name as uploads , u2.name as assign from sale_main_data m left join sale_login_user u on m.uploads = u.id left join sale_login_user u2 on m.assign = u2.id where m.is_real <> 'NO' order by m.priority_level asc , m.begin_date desc

select m.id,m.cus_name,m.begin_date,m.update_date,m.seen_policymaker, m.policymaker_position,m.done_policymaker,m.done_policymaker_position, m.is_real,m.is_real_comment,m.five_user_up,m.five_user_up_comment, m.contact_name,m.contact_phone,m.contact_email,m.important_req, m.cus_emp_num,m.cus_city,m.launch_time,m.close_time,m.next_policymaker_action, m.next_req_action,m.true_close_time,m.status,m.log_info,m.priority_level, u.name as uploads , u2.name as assign from sale_main_data m left join sale_login_user u on m.uploads = u.id left join sale_login_user u2 on m.assign = u2.id where m.seen_policymaker <> 'N' order by m.priority_level asc , m.begin_date desc

select m.id,m.cus_name,m.begin_date,m.update_date,m.seen_policymaker, m.policymaker_position,m.done_policymaker,m.done_policymaker_position, m.is_real,m.is_real_comment,m.five_user_up,m.five_user_up_comment, m.contact_name,m.contact_phone,m.contact_email,m.important_req, m.cus_emp_num,m.cus_city,m.launch_time,m.close_time,m.next_policymaker_action, m.next_req_action,m.true_close_time,m.status,m.log_info,m.priority_level, u.name as uploads , u2.name as assign from sale_main_data m left join sale_login_user u on m.uploads = u.id left join sale_login_user u2 on m.assign = u2.id where m.five_user_up <> 'NO' order by m.priority_level asc , m.begin_date desc

select
distinct
from sale_main_data
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.update: update sale_main_data set update_date = #{updateDate}, uploads = #{uploads}, priority_level = #{priorityLevel} where id = #{id}

update sale_main_data set cus_name = #{cusName}, update_date = #{updateDate}, seen_policymaker = #{seenPolicymaker}, policymaker_position = #{policymakerPosition}, done_policymaker = #{donePolicymaker}, done_policymaker_position = #{donePolicymakerPosition}, is_real = #{isReal}, is_real_comment = #{isRealComment}, five_user_up = #{fiveUserUp}, five_user_up_comment = #{fiveUserUpComment}, contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, contact_email = #{contactEmail}, cus_emp_num = #{cusEmpNum}, cus_city = #{cusCity}, launch_time = #{launchTime}, close_time = #{closeTime}, next_policymaker_action = #{nextPolicymakerAction}, next_req_action = #{nextReqAction}, true_close_time = #{trueCloseTime}, uploads = #{uploads}, assign = #{assign}, priority_level = #{priorityLevel} where id = #{id}

update sale_main_data
cus_name = #{cusName},
begin_date = #{beginDate},
update_date = #{updateDate},
seen_policymaker = #{seenPolicymaker},
policymaker_position = #{policymakerPosition},
done_policymaker = #{donePolicymaker},
done_policymaker_position = #{donePolicymakerPosition},
is_real = #{isReal},
is_real_comment = #{isRealComment},
five_user_up = #{fiveUserUp},
five_user_up_comment = #{fiveUserUpComment},
contact_name = #{contactName},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contact_email = #{contactEmail},
cus_emp_num = #{cusEmpNum},
cus_city = #{cusCity},
launch_time = #{launchTime},
close_time = #{closeTime},
next_policymaker_action = #{nextPolicymakerAction},
next_req_action = #{nextReqAction},
true_close_time = #{trueCloseTime},
status = #{status},
uploads = #{uploads},
assign = #{assign},
important_req = #{importantReq},
log_info = #{logInfo},
priority_level = #{priorityLevel},
where id = #{id}
UPDATE sale_main_data SET status=#{1} WHERE id=#{0}
